com.edinarobotics.utils.commands

Class RepeatCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Command
      • com.edinarobotics.utils.commands.RepeatCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.NamedSendable, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Sendable

    public class RepeatCommand
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Command
    This Command repeats the supplied Command or CommandGroup for the specified number of repetitions. If it is interrupted, it will cancel the command that is running.

      Shuts down RepeatCommand after it has repeated the command the requested number of times.

        Parameters:
        commandToRepeat - The command that is to be repeated.
        repetitions - The number of times to repeat the command.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when repetitions is negative.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        protected void initialize()
        Resets the number of times the commandToRepeat has repeated to 0. This method prepares RepeatCommand for another round of command repetition.
        Overrides:
        initialize in class edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Command

      • isFinished

        protected boolean isFinished()
        Description copied from class: edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Command
        Returns whether this command is finished. If it is, then the command will be removed and end() will be called.

        It may be useful for a team to reference the isTimedOut() method for time-sensitive commands.

        Returning false will result in the command never ending automatically. It may still be cancelled manually or interrupted by another command. Returning true will result in the command executing once and finishing immediately. We recommend using InstantCommand for this.

        Specified by:
        isFinished in class edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Command
        Returns:
        Whether commandToRepeat has stopped and the number of repetitions has completed.
        See Also:
        isTimedOut()

        Shuts down RepeatCommand after it has repeated the command the requested number of times.
